1: %%==============================================================================
    2: %% Copyright 2012 Erlang Solutions Ltd.
    3: %%
    4: %% Test the mod_vcard* modules.
    5: %% mod_vcard uses mnesia
    6: %% mod_vcard_ldap uses ldap
    7: %% mod_vcard_odbc uses odbc
    8: %%
    9: %% They share many comonalities but sometimes behave differently or have
   10: %% some extra or missing features. They also need different config depending
   11: %% on which vhost they're running on.
   12: %%
   13: %%           -----
   14: %%
   15: %% Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
   16: %% you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
   17: %% You may obtain a copy of the License at
   18: %%
   19: %% http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
   20: %%
   21: %% Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
   22: %% distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
   23: %% WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
   24: %% See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
   25: %% limitations under the License.
   26: %%==============================================================================
   27: 
   28: -module(vcard_SUITE).
   29: -compile(export_all).
   30: 
   31: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   32: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   33: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   34: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   35: 
   36: %% Element CData
   37: -define(EL(Element, Name), exml_query:path(Element, [{element, Name}])).
   38: -define(EL_CD(Element, Name), exml_query:path(Element, [{element, Name}, cdata])).
   39: 
   40: -define(PHOTO_BIN, <<130,192,33,159,204,86,12,63,132,164>>).
   41: -define(PHOTO_BASE_64, <<"gsAhn8xWDD+EpA==">>). %% jlib:encode_base64(?PHOTO_BIN)
   42: 
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: %% Suite configuration
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: 
   47: all() ->
   48:     [{group, rw},
   49:      {group, ro_full},
   50:      {group, ro_limited},
   51:      {group, ro_no},
   52:      {group, ldap_only}
   53:      ].
   54: 
   55: groups() ->
   56:     %% setting test data before tests is proving awkward so might as well use the
   57:     %% data set in the update tests to test the rest.
   58:     [{rw, [sequence], rw_tests()},
   59:      {ro_full, [], ro_full_search_tests()},
   60:      {ro_limited, [], ro_limited_search_tests()},
   61:      {ro_no, [sequence], ro_no_search_tests()},
   62:      {ldap_only, [], ldap_only_tests()}
   63:     ].
   64: 
   65: rw_tests() ->
   66:     [update_own_card].
   67: 
   68: ro_full_search_tests() ->
   69:     [retrieve_own_card,
   70:      user_doesnt_exist,
   71:      update_other_card,
   72:      retrieve_others_card,
   73:      vcard_service_discovery,
   74:      server_vcard,
   75:      directory_service_vcard,
   76:      request_search_fields,
   77:      search_open,
   78:      search_empty,
   79:      search_some,
   80:      search_some_many_fields,
   81:      search_wildcard
   82:     ].
   83: 
   84: ro_limited_search_tests() ->
   85:     [search_open_limited,
   86:      search_some_limited,
   87:      search_in_service_discovery].
   88: 
   89: ro_no_search_tests() ->
   90:     [search_not_allowed,
   91:      search_not_in_service_discovery].
   92: 
   93: ldap_only_tests() ->
   94:     [search_some_many_fields_with_or_operator,
   95:      return_photo_inserted_as_binary_by_3rd_party_service].
   96: 
   97: suite() ->
   98:     escalus:suite().
   99: 
  100: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  101: %% Init & teardown
  102: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  103: 
  104: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  105:     NewConfig = escalus:init_per_suite(Config),
  106:     NewConfig1 = vcard_config(NewConfig),
  107:     NewConfig2 = stop_running_vcard_mod(NewConfig1),
  108:     AliceAndBob = escalus_users:get_users([alice, bob]),
  109:     BisUsers = [{aliceb,[{username,<<"aliceb">>},
  110:                         {server,<<"localhost.bis">>},
  111:                         {host, <<"localhost">>},
  112:                         {password,<<"makota">>}]},
  113:                 {bobb,[{username,<<"bobb">>},
  114:                       {server,<<"localhost.bis">>},
  115:                       {host, <<"localhost">>},
  116:                       {password,<<"makrolika">>}]}],
  117:     NewUsers = AliceAndBob ++ BisUsers,
  118:     escalus:create_users([{escalus_users, NewUsers} | NewConfig2], NewUsers).
  119: 
  120: vcard_config(Config) ->
  121:     [{all_vcards, get_all_vcards()},
  122:      {server_vcards, get_server_vcards()},
  123:      {directory_jid, <<"vjud.localhost">>}
  124:     ] ++ Config.
  125: 
  126: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  127:     start_running_vcard_mod(Config),
  128:     Who = ?config(escalus_users, Config),
  129:     NewConfig = escalus:delete_users(Config, Who),
  130:     escalus:end_per_suite(NewConfig).
  131: 
  132: init_per_group(rw, Config) ->
  133:     restart_vcard_mod(Config, rw),
  134:     Config;
  135: init_per_group(ldap_only, Config) ->
  136:     VCardConfig = ?config(mod_vcard, Config),
  137:     case proplists:get_value(backend, VCardConfig) of
  138:         ldap ->
  139:             Config1 = restart_and_prepare_vcard(ldap_only, Config),
  140:             insert_alice_photo(Config1);
  141:             %Config1;
  142:         _ ->
  143:             {skip, "this group is only for ldap vCard backend"}
  144:     end;
  145: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  146:     restart_and_prepare_vcard(GroupName, Config).
  147: 
  148: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  149:     stop_vcard_mod(Config),
  150:     Config.
  151: 
  152: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  153:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  154: 
  155: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  156:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  157: 
  158: restart_and_prepare_vcard(GroupName, Config) ->
  159:     restart_vcard_mod(Config, GroupName),
  160:     prepare_vcards(Config).
  161: 
  162: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  163: %% XEP-0054: vcard-temp Test cases
  164: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  165: 
  166: update_own_card(Config) ->
  167:     case vcard_simple_SUITE:is_vcard_ldap() of
  168:         true ->
  169:             {skip, ldap_vcard_is_readonly};
  170:         _ ->
  171:             do_update_own_card(Config)
  172:     end.
  173: 
  174: do_update_own_card(Config) ->
  175:     escalus:story(
  176:         Config, [{alice, 1}],
  177:         fun(Client1) ->
  178:                 %% set some initial value different from the actual test data
  179:                 %% so we know it really got updated and wasn't just old data
  180:                 Client1Fields = [{<<"FN">>, <<"Old name">>}],
  181:                 Client1SetResultStanza
  182:                     = escalus:send_and_wait(Client1,
  183:                                         escalus_stanza:vcard_update(Client1Fields)),
  184:                 escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Client1SetResultStanza),
  185:                 escalus_stanza:vcard_request(),
  186:                 Client1GetResultStanza
  187:                     = escalus:send_and_wait(Client1, escalus_stanza:vcard_request()),
  188:                 <<"Old name">>
  189:                     = stanza_get_vcard_field_cdata(Client1GetResultStanza, <<"FN">>)
  190:         end).
  191: 
  192: retrieve_own_card(Config) ->
  193:     escalus:story(
  194:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  195:       fun(Client) ->
  196:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  197:                         escalus_stanza:vcard_request()),
  198:               JID = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_client:short_jid(Client)),
  199:               ClientVCardTups = get_user_vcard(JID, Config),
  200:               check_vcard(ClientVCardTups, Res)
  201:       end).
  202: 
  203: 
  204: 
  205: %% If no vCard exists or the user does not exist, the server MUST
  206: %% return a stanza error, which SHOULD be either
  207: %% <service-unavailable/> or <item-not-found/>
  208: user_doesnt_exist(Config) ->
  209:     escalus:story(
  210:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  211:       fun(Client) ->
  212:               BadJID = <<"nonexistent@localhost">>,
  213:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  214:                         escalus_stanza:vcard_request(BadJID)),
  215:           case
  216:           escalus_pred:is_error(<<"cancel">>,
  217:               <<"service-unavailable">>,
  218:               Res) of
  219:               true ->
  220:                   ok;
  221:               _ ->
  222:                   [] = Res#xmlel.children,
  223:                   ct:comment("empty result instead of error")
  224:           end
  225:       end).
  226: 
  227: update_other_card(Config) ->
  228:     escalus:story(
  229:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  230:       fun(Client, OtherClient) ->
  231:               JID = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_client:short_jid(Client)),
  232:               Fields = [{<<"FN">>, <<"New name">>}],
  233:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(OtherClient,
  234:                         escalus_stanza:vcard_update(JID, Fields)),
  235: 
  236:               %% auth forbidden is also allowed
  237:               escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>,
  238:                                         <<"not-allowed">>], Res),
  239: 
  240:               %% check that nothing was changed
  241:               Res2 = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  242:                         escalus_stanza:vcard_request()),
  243:               ClientVCardTups = get_user_vcard(JID, Config),
  244:               check_vcard(ClientVCardTups, Res2)
  245:       end).
  246: 
  247: retrieve_others_card(Config) ->
  248:     escalus:story(
  249:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  250:       fun(Client, OtherClient) ->
  251:               OtherJID = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_client:short_jid(OtherClient)),
  252:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  253:                         escalus_stanza:vcard_request(OtherJID)),
  254:               OtherClientVCardTups = get_user_vcard(OtherJID, Config),
  255:               check_vcard(OtherClientVCardTups, Res),
  256: 
  257:               %% In accordance with XMPP Core [5], a compliant server MUST
  258:               %% respond on behalf of the requestor and not forward the IQ to
  259:               %% the requestee's connected resource.
  260: 
  261:               Res2 = (catch escalus:wait_for_stanza(OtherClient)),
  262:               escalus:assert(stanza_timeout, Res2)
  263:       end).
  264: 
  265: server_vcard(Config) ->
  266:     escalus:story(
  267:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  268:       fun(Client) ->
  269:               ServJID = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  270:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  271:                         escalus_stanza:vcard_request(ServJID)),
  272:               ServerVCardTups = get_server_vcard(ServJID, Config),
  273:               check_vcard(ServerVCardTups, Res)
  274:       end).
  275: 
  276: directory_service_vcard(Config) ->
  277:     escalus:story(
  278:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  279:       fun(Client) ->
  280:               DirJID = ?config(directory_jid, Config),
  281:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  282:                         escalus_stanza:vcard_request(DirJID)),
  283:               DirVCardTups = get_server_vcard(DirJID, Config),
  284:               check_vcard(DirVCardTups, Res)
  285:       end).
  286: 
  287: vcard_service_discovery(Config) ->
  288:     escalus:story(
  289:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  290:       fun(Client) ->
  291:           ServJID = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  292:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  293:                         escalus_stanza:disco_info(ServJID)),
  294:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  295:               escalus:assert(has_feature, [<<"vcard-temp">>], Res)
  296:     end).
  297: 
  298: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  299: %% XEP-0055 jabber:iq:search User Directory service Test cases
  300: %%
  301: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  302: 
  303: %% all.search.domain
  304: 
  305: request_search_fields(Config) ->
  306:     escalus:story(
  307:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  308:       fun(Client) ->
  309:               DirJID = ?config(directory_jid, Config),
  310:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  311:                         escalus_stanza:search_fields_iq(DirJID)),
  312:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  313:               Result = ?EL(Res, <<"query">>),
  314:               XData = ?EL(Result, <<"x">>),
  315:               #xmlel{ children = XChildren } = XData,
  316:               FieldTups = field_tuples(XChildren),
  317:               true = lists:member({<<"text-single">>,
  318:                                    get_user_search_field(), <<"User">>},
  319:                                   FieldTups),
  320:               true = lists:member({<<"text-single">>,
  321:                                    get_full_name_search_field(),
  322:                                    <<"Full Name">>},
  323:                                   FieldTups)
  324:       end).
  325: 
  326: search_open(Config) ->
  327:     escalus:story(
  328:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  329:       fun(Client) ->
  330:               DirJID = ?config(directory_jid, Config),
  331:               Fields = [#xmlel{ name = <<"field">> }],
  332:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  333:                         escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID, Fields)),
  334:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  335: 
  336:               %% Basically test that the right values exist
  337:               %% and map to the right column headings
  338:               ItemTups = search_result_item_tuples(Res),
  339:               ExpectedItemTups = [],
  340:               list_unordered_key_match(ExpectedItemTups, ItemTups)
  341:       end).
  342: 
  343: search_empty(Config) ->
  344:     escalus:story(
  345:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  346:       fun(Client) ->
  347:               DirJID = ?config(directory_jid, Config),
  348:               Fields = [{<<"fn">>, <<"nobody">>}],
  349:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  350:                         escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID,
  351:                             escalus_stanza:search_fields(Fields))),
  352:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  353:               [] = search_result_item_tuples(Res)
  354:       end).
  355: 
  356: search_some(Config) ->
  357:     escalus:story(
  358:       Config, [{bob, 1}],
  359:       fun(Client) ->
  360:               DirJID = ?config(directory_jid, Config),
  361:               MoscowRUBin = get_utf8_city(),
  362:               Fields = [{get_locality_search_field(), MoscowRUBin}],
  363:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  364:                         escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID,
  365:                             escalus_stanza:search_fields(Fields))),
  366:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  367: 
  368:               %% Basically test that the right values exist
  369:               %% and map to the right column headings
  370:               Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  371:               AliceJID = <<"alice@", Domain/binary>>,
  372: 
  373:               [{AliceJID, ItemTups}] = search_result_item_tuples(Res),
  374: 
  375:               {_, _, <<"City">>, MoscowRUBin} = lists:keyfind(<<"City">>, 3, ItemTups)
  376:       end).
  377: 
  378: search_wildcard(Config) ->
  379:     escalus:story(
  380:         Config, [{bob, 1}],
  381:         fun(Client) ->
  382:                 Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain),
  383:                 DirJID = <<"vjud.", Domain/binary>>,
  384:                 Fields = [{get_full_name_search_field(),
  385:                            <<"Doe*">>}],
  386:                 Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  387:                         escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID,
  388:                             escalus_stanza:search_fields(Fields))),
  389:                 escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  390: 
  391:                 ItemTups = search_result_item_tuples(Res),
  392:                 ExpectedItemTups = get_search_results(Config,
  393:                                                       [<<"bobb@localhost.bis">>,
  394:                                                        <<"aliceb@localhost.bis">>]),
  395:                 case vcard_simple_SUITE:is_vcard_ldap() of
  396:                     true ->
  397:                         3 = length(ItemTups);
  398:                     _ ->
  399:                         list_unordered_key_match2(ExpectedItemTups, ItemTups)
  400:                 end
  401:         end).
  402: 
  403: search_some_many_fields(Config) ->
  404:     escalus:story(
  405:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  406:       fun(Client) ->
  407:               {Domain, ItemTups} = search_vcard_by_many_fields(Client),
  408:               SomeJID = <<"aliceb@",Domain/binary>>,
  409:               [{SomeJID, _JIDsFields}] = ItemTups
  410:               %{_Start, _Length} = binary:match(SomeJID, <<"@", Server/binary>>)
  411:       end).
  412: 
  413: search_vcard_by_many_fields(Client) ->
  414:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain),
  415:     DirJID = <<"vjud.", Domain/binary>>,
  416: 
  417:     Fields = [{get_first_name_search_field(), <<"Alice">>},
  418:               {get_last_name_search_field(), <<"Doe">>}],
  419:     Stanza = escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID,
  420:                                       escalus_stanza:search_fields(Fields)),
  421:     Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,Stanza),
  422:     escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  423:     ItemTups = search_result_item_tuples(Res),
  424:     %% exactly one result returned and its JID domain is correct
  425:     {Domain, ItemTups}.
  426: 
  427: search_some_many_fields_with_or_operator(Config) ->
  428:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Client) ->
  429:         {_Domain, ItemTups} = search_vcard_by_many_fields(Client),
  430:         3 = length(ItemTups)
  431:     end).
  432: 
  433: return_photo_inserted_as_binary_by_3rd_party_service(Config) ->
  434:     %% The PHOTO was inserted by script and not by modifing vCard by the client
  435:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}], fun(Alice) ->
  436:         Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Alice,
  437:                                     escalus_stanza:vcard_request()),
  438:         JID = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(escalus_client:short_jid(Alice)),
  439: 
  440:         Photo = exml_query:path(Res, [{element, <<"vCard">>},
  441:                                       {element, <<"PHOTO">>},
  442:                                       {element, <<"BINVAL">>},
  443:                                       cdata]),
  444: 
  445:         ?PHOTO_BASE_64 = Photo,
  446: 
  447:         DirJID = ?config(directory_jid, Config),
  448:         Fields = [{<<"mail">>, <<"alice@mail.example.com">>}],
  449:         Res2 = escalus:send_and_wait(Alice,
  450:                                     escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID,
  451:                                                              escalus_stanza:search_fields(Fields))),
  452:         [{JID, ItemTups}] = search_result_item_tuples(Res2),
  453: 
  454:         {_, <<"PHOTO">>, _, ?PHOTO_BASE_64} = lists:keyfind(<<"PHOTO">>, 2, ItemTups)
  455: 
  456:     end).
  457: 
  458: %%------------------------------------
  459: %% @limited.search.domain
  460: 
  461: search_open_limited(Config) ->
  462:     escalus:story(
  463:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  464:       fun(Client) ->
  465:               Server = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  466:               DirJID = <<"directory.",Server/binary>>,
  467:               Fields = [null],
  468:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  469:                            escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID,
  470:                                escalus_stanza:search_fields(Fields))),
  471:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  472:               %% {allow_return_all, false}
  473:               [] = search_result_item_tuples(Res)
  474:       end).
  475: 
  476: search_some_limited(Config) ->
  477:     escalus:story(
  478:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  479:       fun(Client) ->
  480:               Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain),
  481:               DirJID = <<"directory.", Domain/binary>>,
  482:               Server = escalus_client:server(Client),
  483:               Fields = [{get_last_name_search_field(), <<"Doe">>}],
  484:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  485:                         escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID,
  486:                             escalus_stanza:search_fields(Fields))),
  487:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, Res),
  488:               ItemTups = search_result_item_tuples(Res),
  489:               %% exactly one result returned and its JID domain is correct
  490:               [{SomeJID, _JIDsFields}] = ItemTups,
  491:               {_Start, _Length} = binary:match(SomeJID, <<"@", Server/binary>>)
  492:       end).
  493: 
  494: 
  495: %% disco#items to limited.search.domain says directory.limited.search.domain exists
  496: %% disco#info to directory.limited.search.domain says it has feature jabber:iq:search
  497: %% and an <identity category='directory' type='user'/>
  498: %%   http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0030.html#registrar-reg-identity
  499: search_in_service_discovery(Config) ->
  500:     escalus:story(
  501:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  502:       fun(Client) ->
  503:               ServJID = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  504:               DirJID = <<"directory.",ServJID/binary>>,
  505: 
  506:               %% Item
  507:               ItemsRes = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  508:                                 escalus_stanza:disco_items(ServJID)),
  509:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, ItemsRes),
  510:               escalus:assert(has_item, [DirJID], ItemsRes),
  511: 
  512:               %% Feature
  513:               InfoRes = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  514:                             escalus_stanza:disco_info(DirJID)),
  515:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, InfoRes),
  516:               escalus:assert(has_feature, [?NS_SEARCH], InfoRes),
  517: 
  518:               %% Identity
  519:               escalus:assert(has_identity, [<<"directory">>,
  520:                                             <<"user">>], InfoRes)
  521:       end).
  522: 
  523: %%------------------------------------
  524: %% @no.search.domain
  525: 
  526: search_not_allowed(Config) ->
  527:     escalus:story(
  528:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  529:       fun(Client) ->
  530:               DirJID = ?config(directory_jid, Config),
  531:               Fields = [null],
  532:               Res = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  533:                            escalus_stanza:search_iq(DirJID,
  534:                                escalus_stanza:search_fields(Fields))),
  535:               escalus:assert(is_error, [<<"cancel">>,
  536:                                         <<"service-unavailable">>], Res)
  537:       end).
  538: 
  539: %% disco#items to no.search.domain doesn't say vjud.no.search.domain exists
  540: search_not_in_service_discovery(Config) ->
  541:     escalus:story(
  542:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  543:       fun(Client) ->
  544:               ServJID = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  545:               DirJID = ?config(directory_jid, Config),
  546:               %% Item
  547:               ItemsRes = escalus:send_and_wait(Client,
  548:                             escalus_stanza:disco_items(ServJID)),
  549:               escalus:assert(is_iq_result, ItemsRes),
  550:               escalus:assert(has_no_such_item, [DirJID], ItemsRes)
  551:       end).
  552: 
  553: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  554: %% Helper functions
  555: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  556: 
  557: expected_search_results(Key, Config) ->
  558:     {_, ExpectedResults} =
  559:         lists:keyfind(expected_results, 1,
  560:                       escalus_config:get_config(search_data, Config)),
  561:     lists:keyfind(Key, 1, ExpectedResults).
  562: 
  563: prepare_vcards(Config) ->
  564:     AllVCards = ?config(all_vcards, Config),
  565:     ModVcardBackend = case lists:keyfind(backend, 1, ?config(mod_vcard, Config)) of
  566:                           {backend, Backend} ->
  567:                               Backend;
  568:                           _ ->
  569:                               mnesia
  570:                       end,
  571:     lists:foreach(
  572:         fun({JID, Fields}) ->
  573:                 case binary:match(JID, <<"@">>) of
  574:                     nomatch ->
  575:                         ok;
  576:                     _ ->
  577:                         prepare_vcard(ModVcardBackend, JID, Fields)
  578:                 end
  579:         end, AllVCards),
  580:     timer:sleep(timer:seconds(3)), %give some time to Yokozuna to index vcards
  581:     Config.
  582: 
  583: prepare_vcard(ldap, JID, Fields) ->
  584:     [User, Server] = binary:split(JID, <<"@">>),
  585:     {EPid, Base} = get_ldap_pid_and_base(Server),
  586:     VCardMap = [{<<"NICKNAME">>, <<"%u">>, []},
  587:                 {<<"FN">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"displayName">>]},
  588:                 {<<"FAMILY">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"sn">>]},
  589:                 {<<"GIVEN">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"givenName">>]},
  590:                 {<<"MIDDLE">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"initials">>]},
  591:                 {<<"ORGNAME">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"o">>]},
  592:                 {<<"ORGUNIT">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"ou">>]},
  593: 
  594:                 %{<<"CTRY">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"c">>]},
  595:                 {<<"LOCALITY">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"l">>]},
  596:                 {<<"STREET">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"street">>]},
  597:                 {<<"REGION">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"st">>]},
  598: 
  599:                 {<<"PCODE">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"postalCode">>]},
  600:                 {<<"TITLE">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"title">>]},
  601:                 {<<"URL">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"labeleduri">>]},
  602:                 {<<"DESC">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"description">>]},
  603:                 {<<"TEL">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"telephoneNumber">>]},
  604:                 {<<"NUMBER">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"telephoneNumber">>]},
  605: 
  606:                 {<<"EMAIL">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"mail">>]},
  607:                 {<<"USERID">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"mail">>]},
  608: %%                 {<<"BDAY">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"birthDay">>]}, %OpenLDAP doesn't sport it by default
  609:                 {<<"ROLE">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"employeeType">>]},
  610:                 {<<"PHOTO">>, <<"%s">>, [<<"jpegPhoto">>]}
  611:     ],
  612:     Fun = fun(Field, Val) ->
  613:         case vcard_field_to_ldap(VCardMap, Field) of
  614:             undefined ->
  615:                 undefined;
  616:             LdapField ->
  617:                 escalus_ejabberd:rpc(eldap, mod_replace, [LdapField, [Val]])
  618:         end
  619:     end,
  620:     Modificators = convert_vcard_fields(Fields, [], Fun),
  621:     Dn = <<"cn=",User/binary,",",Base/binary>>,
  622:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(eldap, modify, [EPid, Dn, Modificators]);
  623: prepare_vcard(_, JID, Fields) ->
  624:     RJID = get_jid_record(JID),
  625:     VCard = escalus_stanza:vcard_update(JID, Fields),
  626:     ok = vcard_rpc(RJID, VCard).
  627: 
  628: insert_alice_photo(Config) ->
  629:     User = <<"alice">>,
  630:     Server = <<"localhost">>,
  631:     {EPid, Base} = get_ldap_pid_and_base(Server),
  632:     Photo = ?PHOTO_BIN,
  633:     Modificators = [escalus_ejabberd:rpc(eldap, mod_replace, [<<"jpegPhoto">>, [Photo]])],
  634:     Dn = <<"cn=",User/binary,",",Base/binary>>,
  635:     ok = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(eldap, modify, [EPid, Dn, Modificators]),
  636:     Config.
  637: 
  638: 
  639: fields_to_ldap_modificators(_, [], Acc) ->
  640:     Acc;
  641: fields_to_ldap_modificators(VcardMap, [{Field, Val} | Rest], Acc) when is_binary(Val) ->
  642:     case vcard_field_to_ldap(VcardMap, Field) of
  643:         undefined ->
  644:             NewAcc = Acc;
  645:         LdapField ->
  646:             LdapModify = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(eldap, mod_replace, [LdapField, [Val]]),
  647:             NewAcc = [LdapModify | Acc]
  648:     end,
  649:     fields_to_ldap_modificators(VcardMap, Rest, NewAcc);
  650: fields_to_ldap_modificators(VcardMap, [{_, Children} | Rest], Acc) when is_list(Children) ->
  651:     NewAcc = fields_to_ldap_modificators(VcardMap, Children, Acc),
  652:     fields_to_ldap_modificators(VcardMap, Rest, NewAcc).
  653: 
  654: vcard_field_to_ldap(Map, Field) ->
  655:     case lists:keyfind(Field, 1, Map) of
  656:         {Field, _, [LdapField]} ->
  657:             LdapField;
  658:         _ ->
  659:             undefined
  660:     end.
  661: 
  662: get_ldap_pid_and_base(Server) ->
  663:     {ok, State} = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(eldap_utils, get_state,
  664:         [Server, ejabberd_mod_vcard_ldap]),
  665:     EldapId = element(4, State),
  666:     PoolId = binary_to_atom(<<"eldap_pool_", EldapId/binary>>, utf8),
  667:     Pid = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(pg2, get_closest_pid, [PoolId]),
  668:     Base = element(10, State),
  669:     {Pid, Base}.
  670: 
  671: delete_vcards(Config) ->
  672:      AllVCards
  673:         = escalus_config:get_ct({vcard, data, all_search, expected_vcards}),
  674: 
  675:     lists:foreach(
  676:         fun({JID, _}) ->
  677:                 case binary:match(JID, <<"@">>) of
  678:                     nomatch ->
  679:                         ok;
  680:                     _ ->
  681:                         RJID = get_jid_record(JID),
  682:                         ok = vcard_rpc(RJID,
  683:                                        escalus_stanza:vcard_update(JID, []))
  684:                 end
  685:         end, AllVCards),
  686:     Config.
  687: 
  688: get_jid_record(JID) ->
  689:     [User, Server] = binary:split(JID, <<"@">>),
  690:     {jid, User, Server, <<"">>, User, Server, <<"">>}.
  691: 
  692: vcard_rpc(JID, Stanza) ->
  693:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, route, [JID, JID, Stanza]).
  694: 
  695: restart_vcard_mod(Config, ro_limited) ->
  696:     restart_mod(params_limited(Config));
  697: restart_vcard_mod(Config, ro_no) ->
  698:     restart_mod(params_no(Config));
  699: restart_vcard_mod(Config, ldap_only) ->
  700:     restart_mod(params_ldap_only(Config));
  701: restart_vcard_mod(Config, _GN) ->
  702:     restart_mod(params_all(Config)).
  703: 
  704: start_running_vcard_mod(Config) ->
  705:     Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  706:     OriginalVcardConfig = ?config(mod_vcard, Config),
  707:     dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_vcard, OriginalVcardConfig).
  708: stop_running_vcard_mod(Config) ->
  709:     Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  710:     CurrentConfigs = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(gen_mod, loaded_modules_with_opts, [Domain]),
  711:     {mod_vcard, CurrentVcardConfig} = lists:keyfind(mod_vcard, 1, CurrentConfigs),
  712:     dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_vcard),
  713:     [{mod_vcard, CurrentVcardConfig} | Config].
  714: 
  715: stop_vcard_mod(Config) ->
  716:     Domain = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  717:     dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_vcard).
  718: 
  719: params_all(Config) ->
  720:     add_backend_param([], ?config(mod_vcard, Config)).
  721: 
  722: params_limited(Config) ->
  723:     add_backend_param([{matches, 1},
  724:                        {host, "directory.@HOST@"}], ?config(mod_vcard, Config)).
  725: 
  726: params_no(Config) ->
  727:     add_backend_param([{search, false}], ?config(mod_vcard, Config)).
  728: 
  729: params_ldap_only(Config) ->
  730:     Reported = [{<<"Full Name">>, <<"FN">>},
  731: 	 {<<"Given Name">>, <<"FIRST">>},
  732: 	 {<<"Middle Name">>, <<"MIDDLE">>},
  733: 	 {<<"Family Name">>, <<"LAST">>},
  734: 	 {<<"Nickname">>, <<"NICK">>},
  735: 	 {<<"Birthday">>, <<"BDAY">>},
  736: 	 {<<"Country">>, <<"CTRY">>},
  737: 	 {<<"City">>, <<"LOCALITY">>},
  738: 	 {<<"Email">>, <<"EMAIL">>},
  739: 	 {<<"Organization Name">>, <<"ORGNAME">>},
  740: 	 {<<"Organization Unit">>, <<"ORGUNIT">>},
  741:      {<<"Photo">>, <<"PHOTO">>}],
  742:     add_backend_param([{ldap_search_operator, 'or'},
  743:                        {ldap_binary_search_fields, [<<"PHOTO">>]},
  744:                        {ldap_search_reported, Reported}],
  745:                       ?config(mod_vcard, Config)).
  746: 
  747: add_backend_param(Opts, CurrentVCardConfig) ->
  748:     F = fun({Key, _} = Item, Cfg) ->
  749:         lists:keystore(Key, 1, Cfg, Item)
  750:     end,
  751:     lists:foldl(F, CurrentVCardConfig, Opts).
  752: 
  753: 
  754: restart_mod(Params) ->
  755:     Domain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_domain),
  756:     SecDomain = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_secondary_domain),
  757:     dynamic_modules:stop(Domain, mod_vcard),
  758:     dynamic_modules:stop(SecDomain, mod_vcard),
  759:     {ok, _Pid} = dynamic_modules:start(Domain, mod_vcard, Params),
  760:     {ok, _Pid2} = dynamic_modules:start(SecDomain, mod_vcard, Params).
  761: 
  762: %%----------------------
  763: %% xmlel shortcuts
  764: stanza_get_vcard_field(Stanza, FieldName) ->
  765:     VCard = ?EL(Stanza, <<"vCard">>),
  766:     ?EL(VCard, FieldName).
  767: 
  768: stanza_get_vcard_field_cdata(Stanza, FieldName) ->
  769:     VCard = ?EL(Stanza, <<"vCard">>),
  770:     ?EL_CD(VCard, FieldName).
  771: 
  772: %%---------------------
  773: %% test helpers
  774: 
  775: %%
  776: %% -> [{Type, Var, Label}]
  777: %%
  778: field_tuples([]) ->
  779:     [];
  780: field_tuples([#xmlel{name = <<"field">>,
  781:                           attrs=Attrs,
  782:                           children=_Children} = El| Rest]) ->
  783:     {<<"type">>,Type} = lists:keyfind(<<"type">>, 1, Attrs),
  784:     {<<"var">>,Var} = lists:keyfind(<<"var">>, 1, Attrs),
  785:     {<<"label">>,Label} = lists:keyfind(<<"label">>, 1, Attrs),
  786:     case ?EL_CD(El, <<"value">>) of
  787:         undefined ->
  788:             [{Type, Var, Label}|field_tuples(Rest)];
  789:         ValCData ->
  790:             [{Type, Var, Label, ValCData}|field_tuples(Rest)]
  791:     end;
  792: field_tuples([_SomeOtherEl|Rest]) ->
  793:     field_tuples(Rest).
  794: 
  795: 
  796: %%
  797: %%  -> [{Type, Var, Label, ValueCData}]
  798: %%
  799: %% This is naiive and expensive LOL!
  800: item_field_tuples(_, []) ->
  801:     [];
  802: item_field_tuples(ReportedFieldTups,
  803:                   [#xmlel{name = <<"field">>,
  804:                                attrs=Attrs,
  805:                                children=_Children} = El| Rest]) ->
  806:     {<<"var">>,Var} = lists:keyfind(<<"var">>, 1, Attrs),
  807:     {Type, Var, Label} = lists:keyfind(Var, 2, ReportedFieldTups),
  808:     [{Type, Var, Label, ?EL_CD(El, <<"value">>)}
  809:      | item_field_tuples(ReportedFieldTups, Rest)];
  810: 
  811: item_field_tuples(ReportedFieldTups, [_SomeOtherEl|Rest]) ->
  812:     item_field_tuples(ReportedFieldTups, Rest).
  813: 
  814: 
  815: %%
  816: %% -> [{JID, [ItemFieldTups]}]
  817: %%
  818: %% Finds the JID and maps fields to their labels and types
  819: %%
  820: item_tuples(_, []) ->
  821:     [];
  822: item_tuples(ReportedFieldTups, [#xmlel{name = <<"item">>,
  823:                                             children = Children} | Rest]) ->
  824:     ItemFieldTups = item_field_tuples(ReportedFieldTups, Children),
  825:     {_,_,_,JID} = lists:keyfind(<<"jid">>, 2, ItemFieldTups),
  826:     [{JID, ItemFieldTups}|item_tuples(ReportedFieldTups, Rest)];
  827: item_tuples(ReportedFieldTypes, [_SomeOtherChild | Rest]) ->
  828:     item_tuples(ReportedFieldTypes, Rest).
  829: 
  830: 
  831: %% This tests that at least the values in the ExpectedVCardTups are in the
  832: %% VCardUnderTest.
  833: %% Any extra values in the vcard are ignored by this function and should be
  834: %% checked or rejected elsewhere.
  835: %% crash means fail, return means success.
  836: check_vcard(ExpectedVCardTups, Stanza) ->
  837:     escalus_pred:is_iq(<<"result">>, Stanza),
  838:     VCardUnderTest = ?EL(Stanza, <<"vCard">>),
  839:     check_xml_element(ExpectedVCardTups, VCardUnderTest).
  840: 
  841: 
  842: check_xml_element([], _ElUnderTest) ->
  843:     ok;  %% just return true to be consistent with other clauses.
  844: check_xml_element([{ExpdFieldName, ExpdChildren}|Rest], ElUnderTest)
  845:   when is_list(ExpdChildren) ->
  846:     check_xml_element(ExpdChildren, ?EL(ElUnderTest, ExpdFieldName)),
  847:     check_xml_element(Rest, ElUnderTest);
  848: check_xml_element([{ExpdFieldName, ExpdCData}|Rest], ElUnderTest) ->
  849:     case ?EL_CD(ElUnderTest, ExpdFieldName) of
  850:         ExpdCData ->
  851:             check_xml_element(Rest, ElUnderTest);
  852:         Else ->
  853:             ct:fail("Expected ~p got ~p~n", [ExpdCData, Else])
  854:     end.
  855: 
  856: %% Checks that the elements of two lists with matching keys are equal
  857: %% while the order of the elements does not matter.
  858: %% Returning means success. Crashing via ct:fail means failure.
  859: %% Prints the lists in the ct:fail Result term.
  860: list_unordered_key_match(Expected, Actual) ->
  861:     case length(Actual) of
  862:         ActualLength when ActualLength == length(Expected) ->
  863:             list_unordered_key_match2(Expected, Actual);
  864:         ActualLength ->
  865:             ct:fail("Expected size ~p, actual size ~p~nExpected: ~p~nActual: ~p",
  866:                     [length(Expected), ActualLength, Expected, Actual])
  867:     end.
  868: 
  869: list_unordered_key_match2([], _) ->
  870:     ok;
  871: list_unordered_key_match2([{User, ExpectedTup} | Rest], ActualTuples) ->
  872: 
  873:     case lists:keyfind(User, 1, ActualTuples) of
  874:         {User, ReceivedTuple} ->
  875:             verify_tuples(ReceivedTuple, ExpectedTup);
  876:         _ ->
  877:             ct:fail("can't find user ~p in received results: ~p",
  878:                     [User, ActualTuples])
  879: 
  880:     end.
  881: 
  882: verify_tuples(Received, Expected) ->
  883:     Fun = fun({_, _, Name, Value} = ExpectedItem) ->
  884:         case lists:keyfind(Name, 3, Received) of
  885:             {_, _, Name, Value} ->
  886:                 true;
  887:             _ ->
  888:                 ct:fail("can't find item ~p in received items:~p", [ExpectedItem, Received])
  889:         end
  890:     end,
  891:     lists:all(Fun, Expected).
  892: 
  893: 
  894: search_result_item_tuples(Stanza) ->
  895:     Result = ?EL(Stanza, <<"query">>),
  896:     XData = ?EL(Result, <<"x">>),
  897:     #xmlel{ attrs = _XAttrs,
  898:                  children = XChildren } = XData,
  899:     Reported = ?EL(XData, <<"reported">>),
  900:     ReportedFieldTups = field_tuples(Reported#xmlel.children),
  901:     _ItemTups = item_tuples(ReportedFieldTups, XChildren).
  902: 
  903: get_all_vcards() ->
  904:     [{<<"alice@localhost">>,
  905:       [{<<"NICKNAME">>, <<"alice">>},
  906:        {<<"FN">>, <<"Wonderland, Alice">>},
  907:        {<<"TITLE">>, <<"Executive Director">>},
  908:        {<<"ROLE">>, <<"Patron Saint">>},
  909:        {<<"DESC">>, <<"active">>},
  910:        {<<"URL">>, <<"http://john.doe/">>},
  911:        %{<<"PHOTO">>, crypto:rand_bytes(10)},
  912:        {<<"EMAIL">>,
  913:         [{<<"USERID">>, <<"alice@mail.example.com">>}]},
  914:        {<<"N">>,
  915:         [{<<"FAMILY">>, <<"Wonderland">>},
  916:          {<<"GIVEN">>, <<"Alice">>},
  917:          {<<"MIDDLE">>, <<"I.N.">>}]},
  918:        {<<"ADR">>,
  919:         [{<<"STREET">>, <<"1899 Wynkoop Street">>},
  920:          {<<"LOCALITY">>, get_utf8_city()},
  921:          {<<"REGION">>, <<"CO">>},
  922:          {<<"PCODE">>, <<"91210">>}
  923:         ] ++ maybe_add_ctry()},
  924:        {<<"TEL">>,
  925:         [{<<"NUMBER">>, <<"+1 512 305 0280">>}]},
  926:        {<<"ORG">>,
  927:         [{<<"ORGNAME">>, <<"The world">>},
  928:          {<<"ORGUNIT">>, <<"People">>}]}
  929:       ] ++ maybe_add_bday() ++ maybe_add_jabberd_id(<<"alice@localhost">>)},
  930:      {<<"bob@localhost">>,
  931:       [{<<"NICKNAME">>, <<"bob">>},
  932:        {<<"FN">>, <<"Doe, Bob">>},
  933:        {<<"ADR">>, [{<<"STREET">>,
  934:            <<208,146,32,208,161,208,190,208,178,
  935:            208,181,209,130,209,129,208,186,208,190,208,185,32,
  936:            208,160,208,190,209,129,209,129,208,184,208,184,44,
  937:            32,208,180,208,190,209,128,208,190,208,179,208,176,
  938:            32,209,128,208,176,208,183,208,178,208,181,209,130,
  939:            208,178,208,187,209,143,208,181,209,130,209,129,209,
  940:            143,32,208,178,209,139>>}]}
  941:       ] ++ maybe_add_jabberd_id(<<"bob@localhost">>)},
  942:      {<<"bobb@localhost.bis">>,
  943:       [{<<"NICKNAME">>, <<"bobb">>},
  944:        {<<"FN">>, <<"Doe, Bob">>},
  945:        {<<"N">>,
  946:         [{<<"FAMILY">>, <<"Doe">>},
  947:          {<<"GIVEN">>, <<"Bob">>}]}
  948:       ] ++ maybe_add_jabberd_id(<<"bobb@localhost.bis">>)},
  949:      {<<"aliceb@localhost.bis">>,
  950:       [{<<"NICKNAME">>, <<"aliceb">>},
  951:        {<<"FN">>, <<"Doe, Alice">>},
  952:        {<<"N">>,
  953:         [{<<"FAMILY">>, <<"Doe">>},
  954:          {<<"GIVEN">>, <<"Alice">>}]}
  955:       ] ++ maybe_add_jabberd_id(<<"aliceb@localhost.bis">>)}
  956:     ].
  957: 
  958: maybe_add_ctry() ->
  959:     maybe_add([{<<"CTRY">>, <<"PL">>}]).
  960: 
  961: maybe_add_bday() ->
  962:     maybe_add([{<<"BDAY">>, <<"2011-08-06">>}]).
  963: 
  964: maybe_add_jabberd_id(JabberId) ->
  965:     maybe_add([{<<"JABBERID">>, JabberId}]).
  966: 
  967: maybe_add(Elems) ->
  968:     case vcard_simple_SUITE:is_vcard_ldap() of
  969:         true ->
  970:             [];
  971:         _ ->
  972:             Elems
  973:     end.
  974: 
  975: get_server_vcards() ->
  976:     [{<<"localhost">>,
  977:       [{<<"FN">>, <<"MongooseIM">>},
  978:        {<<"DESC">>, <<"MongooseIM XMPP Server\nCopyright (c) Erlang Solutions Ltd.">>}]},
  979:      {<<"vjud.localhost">>,
  980:       [{<<"FN">>, <<"MongooseIM/mod_vcard">>},
  981:        {<<"DESC">>, <<"MongooseIM vCard module\nCopyright (c) Erlang Solutions Ltd.">>}]}].
  982: 
  983: 
  984: get_user_vcard(JID, Config) ->
  985:     {JID, ClientVCardTups} = lists:keyfind(JID, 1, ?config(all_vcards, Config)),
  986:     ClientVCardTups.
  987: 
  988: get_server_vcard(ServerJid, Config) ->
  989:     {ServerJid, VCard} = lists:keyfind(ServerJid, 1, ?config(server_vcards, Config)),
  990:     VCard.
  991: 
  992: get_search_results(Config, Users) ->
  993:     [{User, get_search_result(get_user_vcard(User, Config))} || User <- Users].
  994: 
  995: get_search_result(VCard) ->
  996:     convert_vcard_fields(VCard, [], fun vcard_field_to_result/2).
  997: 
  998: get_locality_search_field() ->
  999:     get_search_field(<<"locality">>, <<"l">>).
 1000: 
 1001: get_user_search_field() ->
 1002:     get_search_field(<<"user">>, <<"%u">>).
 1003: 
 1004: get_full_name_search_field() ->
 1005:     get_search_field(<<"fn">>, <<"displayName">>).
 1006: 
 1007: get_last_name_search_field() ->
 1008:     get_search_field(<<"last">>, <<"sn">>).
 1009: 
 1010: get_first_name_search_field() ->
 1011:     get_search_field(<<"first">>, <<"givenName">>).
 1012: 
 1013: get_search_field(Default, LDAP) ->
 1014:     case vcard_simple_SUITE:is_vcard_ldap() of
 1015:         true ->
 1016:             LDAP;
 1017:         _ ->
 1018:             Default
 1019:     end.
 1020: 
 1021: convert_vcard_fields([], Acc, _) -> Acc;
 1022: convert_vcard_fields([{_Field, Children} | Rest], Acc, Fun) when is_list(Children) ->
 1023:     NewAcc = convert_vcard_fields(Children, Acc, Fun),
 1024:     convert_vcard_fields(Rest, NewAcc, Fun);
 1025: convert_vcard_fields([{Field, Value} | Rest], Acc, Fun) ->
 1026:     NewAcc = case Fun(Field, Value) of
 1027:                  undefined ->
 1028:                      Acc;
 1029:                  Result ->
 1030:                      [Result | Acc]
 1031:     end,
 1032:     convert_vcard_fields(Rest, NewAcc, Fun).
 1033: 
 1034: 
 1035: vcard_field_to_result(Field, Value) ->
 1036:     case vcard_result_mapping(Field) of
 1037:         undefined ->
 1038:             undefined;
 1039:         Short ->
 1040:             case lists:keyfind(Short, 2, reported_fields()) of
 1041:                 {Type, Short, Long} ->
 1042:                     {Type, Short, Long, Value};
 1043:                 _ ->
 1044:                     undefined
 1045:             end
 1046:     end.
 1047: 
 1048: reported_fields() ->
 1049:     [{<<"text-single">>,<<"fn">>, <<"Full Name">>},
 1050:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"last">>, <<"Family Name">>},
 1051:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"first">>,<<"Name">>},
 1052:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"middle">>,<<"Middle Name">>},
 1053:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"nick">>,<<"Nickname">>},
 1054:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"bday">>,<<"Birthday">>},
 1055:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"ctry">>,<<"Country">>},
 1056:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"locality">>,<<"City">>},
 1057:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"email">>,<<"Email">>},
 1058:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"orgname">>, <<"Organization Name">>},
 1059:      {<<"text-single">>,<<"orgunit">>, <<"Organization Unit">>}
 1060:     ] ++ maybe_add_jabberd_field().
 1061: 
 1062: maybe_add_jabberd_field() ->
 1063:     case vcard_simple_SUITE:is_vcard_ldap() of
 1064:         true ->
 1065:             [];
 1066:         _ ->
 1067:             [{<<"jid-single">>,<<"jid">>,<<"Jabber ID">>}]
 1068:     end.
 1069: 
 1070: 
 1071: vcard_result_mapping(<<"NICKNAME">>) -> <<"nick">>;
 1072: vcard_result_mapping(<<"FN">>) -> <<"fn">>;
 1073: vcard_result_mapping(<<"USERID">>) -> <<"email">>;
 1074: vcard_result_mapping(<<"FAMILY">>) -> <<"last">>;
 1075: vcard_result_mapping(<<"GIVEN">>) -> <<"first">>;
 1076: vcard_result_mapping(<<"MIDDLE">>) -> <<"middle">>;
 1077: vcard_result_mapping(<<"LOCALITY">>) -> <<"locality">>;
 1078: vcard_result_mapping(<<"CTRY">>) -> <<"ctry">>;
 1079: vcard_result_mapping(<<"ORGNAME">>) -> <<"orgname">>;
 1080: vcard_result_mapping(<<"ORGUNIT">>) -> <<"orgunit">>;
 1081: vcard_result_mapping(<<"JABBERID">>) -> <<"jid">>;
 1082: vcard_result_mapping(<<"BDAY">>) -> <<"bday">>;
 1083: vcard_result_mapping(_) -> undefined.
 1084: 
 1085: get_utf8_city() ->
 1086:     %% This is the UTF-8 of Москва
 1087:     <<208,156,208,190,209,129,208,186,208,178,208,176>>.
 1088: 
 1089:
